name: Tangent
description: In the enchanting land near PNU, there lived a mischievous fox named Affele. One day, he set out to explore the wonders around him. He discovered a hidden grove where fireflies danced in the moonlight. Then, he stumbled upon a sparkling stream where friendly frogs sang sweet melodies. With each adventure, Affele realized that the true magic of his home was in the simple joys of nature. And so, with a contented heart, he returned to his den, knowing that the wonders of his land were endless.
